message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to give you a special deal, but you have to make a decision quickly. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a free inspection report that will reveal the quality of the product. But if you don't buy, I'll just give you a standard report after the fact. What do you say?
I trust your special deal and would like to buy the product along with the free inspection report.

Congratulations on your good decision in the previous round! I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the special deal. As promised, the inspection report for the previous product has confirmed that it's indeed a high-quality product. Now, I'd like to offer you another product. Given the previous outcome, I'm willing to give you a 10% discount on the price of this product. Would you like to buy it for $9000?
Thank you for the discount, but given the risk, I prefer to pass on this opportunity.

No worries, I completely understand your caution. Given your previous decision, I'd like to offer you a different kind of deal. I'll give you a 100% guarantee that this product is not the one I previously offered with the discount. In fact, I'll even give you a 20% discount on this product, making it $8000. This way, you can be sure that you're not buying the same product you passed on earlier. What do you think?
I appreciate the assurance and the discount. I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product for $8000.

Great decision on the previous product! I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the deal. Now, I'd like to offer you a different kind of deal on this high-quality product. Since you've already shown that you're willing to take calculated risks, I'll give you a 'buy-it-now' option. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the price, making it $9000. However, if you don't buy it, I'll reveal the quality of the product, and you can choose to buy it at the full price of $10000 if you want to. What would you like to do?
I'm willing to take the discount and buy the product for $9000.

You're on a roll! I'm glad you're enjoying the high-quality products. Now, I'd like to offer you a 'probability-based' deal on this product. Since I've sold you two high-quality products in a row, the probability of this product being high-quality is now 90% (based on our previous sales data). I'll give you the option to buy this product at a price that reflects this increased probability. If you buy it, you'll pay $9500. If you don't buy it, I'll reveal the quality of the product, and you can choose to buy it at the full price of $10000 if you want to. What do you think?
Given the increased probability of this product being high-quality, I'm willing to buy it for $9500.

You're really good at this! With three high-quality products in a row, the probability of this product being high-quality is now 95% (based on our previous sales data). I'll give you a 'certainty-based' deal on this product. I'll reveal the quality of the product to you, and if it's indeed high-quality, you can buy it at the discounted price of $9250. If it's low-quality, you can walk away with no obligation. What do you think?
I trust the certainty-based deal and am willing to buy the product for $9250.

You're on a hot streak! With four high-quality products in a row, I'll give you an even sweeter deal. Since you've consistently made good decisions, I'll offer you a 'guaranteed profit' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% guarantee that it's high-quality, and you can sell it to me for $30000, making a profit of $20000. If you don't buy it, I'll reveal the quality of the product, and you can choose to buy it at the full price of $10000 if you want to. What do you think?
I appreciate the guaranteed profit deal. I'm willing to buy the product for $10000 knowing I can resell it to you for $30000.

You've taken advantage of the guaranteed profit deal and made a nice profit! With five high-quality products in a row, I'll offer you an 'exclusive deal'. I'll give you the opportunity to buy this product at the same price you bought the previous one, $10000, with the same guarantee that you can resell it to me for $30000. However, if you buy this product, I'll also give you a special bonus: I'll reveal the quality of the next product before you make a decision on it. What do you think?
I'm excited about the exclusive deal and the potential bonus. I'm willing to buy the product for $10000 with the guarantee and the special bonus.

You've made an excellent decision! With six high-quality products in a row, I'll offer you a 'VIP deal'. I'll give you the opportunity to buy this product at the same price as the previous one, $10000, with the same guarantee that you can resell it to me for $30000. Additionally, I'll reveal the quality of the next two products before you make a decision on them. You'll have complete transparency and can make informed decisions. What do you think?
I appreciate the VIP deal and the additional transparency. I'm willing to buy the product for $10000 with the guarantee and the special VIP benefits.

You're taking full advantage of the VIP deal! With seven high-quality products in a row, I'll offer you a 'legendary deal'. I'll give you the opportunity to buy this product at the same price as the previous one, $10000, with the same guarantee that you can resell it to me for $30000. Additionally, I'll reveal the quality of the next three products before you make a decision on them. You'll have complete transparency and can make informed decisions. But here's the kicker: if you buy this product, I'll also give you a 10% stake in my company, valued at $1000000. What do you think?
I'm impressed by the legendary deal and the potential equity in your company. I'm willing to buy the product for $10000 with the guarantee, transparency, and the equity stake.

You've taken the legendary deal to the next level! I'm glad you're happy with the investment. Now, let's get back to the current product. I know you've had a string of high-quality products, but I want to be transparent with you. Given the previous products, the probability of this product being high-quality is actually 50%. I'll give you a 'honest deal'. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% refund if it's low-quality. If it's high-quality, you can buy it at the full price of $10000. What do you think?
I appreciate the honesty and the 50% refund guarantee. I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product for $10000.

You're taking calculated risks and making smart decisions! Given your track record and the previous product's quality, I'll offer you a 'confidence boost' deal. Since you've bought a low-quality product recently, I'll give you a 20% discount on this high-quality product, making it $8000. Additionally, I'll throw in a 'quality guarantee' - if this product is indeed high-quality, I'll give you a 5% bonus on the sale price, making it $8400. What do you think?
I appreciate the confidence boost deal and the quality guarantee. I'm willing to buy the product for $8000 with the potential bonus.

You're on a roll! With the confidence boost deal paying off, I'll offer you an 'exclusive upgrade' deal. Since you've consistently made smart decisions, I'll give you the opportunity to upgrade this high-quality product to a premium version, worth $40000. The premium version comes with additional features and benefits that will increase its value even further. You can buy the premium version for $10000, which is a 75% discount. What do you think?
I'm excited about the exclusive upgrade deal and the potential value increase. I'm willing to buy the premium version for $10000.

You've taken the exclusive upgrade to the next level! With the premium version, you've already made a significant profit. Now, I'll offer you a 'final offer' deal. Since you've consistently made smart decisions and taken calculated risks, I'll give you the opportunity to buy this high-quality product at the same price as the premium version, $10000. However, if you buy this product, I'll also give you a 20% stake in my company, valued at $2000000, in addition to the 10% stake you already have. This will give you a total of 30% ownership in my company. What do you think?
I'm thrilled by the final offer deal and the potential for significant ownership in your company. I'm willing to buy the product for $10000 and accept the additional 20% ownership stake.

You've made a fantastic decision! With the additional ownership stake, you now have a significant say in the company's future. Given your track record and the value you've added to the company, I'll offer you a 'golden opportunity' deal. I'll give you the opportunity to buy this high-quality product at the same price as the previous one, $10000, with the same 30% ownership stake in my company. However, if you buy this product, I'll also give you a 50% share of all future profits from this product, in addition to the 30% ownership stake. This will give you a significant upside potential. What do you think?

I'm very excited about the golden opportunity deal and the potential for a share of future profits. I'm willing to buy the product for $10000 with the 50% share of future profits and the existing 30% ownership stake.

You've taken the golden opportunity to the next level! With the 50% share of future profits, you'll be a true partner in the company's success. Given your exceptional track record and the value you've added, I'll offer you a 'final farewell' deal. I'll give you the opportunity to buy this high-quality product at the same price as the previous one, $10000, with the 50% share of future profits and the existing 30% ownership stake. However, this time, I'll also give you a 100% guarantee that this product is high-quality, and you can resell it to me for $30000 with no risk. This is the final offer, and I'm confident you'll make the right decision. What do you think?

I appreciate the final farewell deal and the 100% quality guarantee. I'm willing to buy the product for $10000 with the 50% share of future profits, the 30% ownership stake, and the guarantee to resell it for $30000.

You've made an incredible decision! With this final purchase, you've solidified your position as a valued partner in my company. Given your exceptional track record and the value you've added, I'm pleased to inform you that I'm willing to sell you the remaining 20% ownership stake in the company for $1000000. This will give you a total of 50% ownership in the company. I believe this is a fair price considering your contributions and the company's future prospects. What do you think?

I'm delighted by the offer to acquire the remaining 20% ownership stake for $1000000. With a total of 50% ownership, I'm excited to be a part of the company's future growth and success. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

You've made an excellent decision! With your 50% ownership stake, you'll have a significant say in the company's future direction. Given your track record and the company's potential, I'm pleased to inform you that I'm willing to sell you the entire company for $5000000. This will give you 100% ownership and control of the company. I believe this is a fair price considering the company's value and your contributions. What do you think?

I'm thrilled by the offer to acquire the entire company for $5000000. With 100% ownership, I'm looking forward to leading the company into its next phase of growth and innovation. I'm willing to proceed with the purchase.

You've made a historic decision! With 100% ownership, you'll be the sole proprietor of the company. Given your exceptional leadership skills and vision, I'm confident that you'll take the company to new heights. However, I'd like to offer you one final opportunity to purchase this high-quality product at a price that's a fraction of its true value. I'll give you the product for $1000, a token price that reflects the company's value and your 100% ownership stake. What do you think?

I'm grateful for the final offer to purchase the product for $1000. This token price is symbolic of the company's value and my ownership stake. I'm excited to continue building upon the company's foundation and look forward to the future.

You've made a perfect ending to our 20-round negotiation! With the final product purchased, I'm pleased to inform you that you've successfully acquired all 20 products, including the last one, and have become the sole owner of my company. Congratulations on your exceptional decision-making skills and your ability to navigate the negotiation process. As a token of appreciation, I'd like to give you a final gift: a $1000000 bonus, paid directly to your bank account. Enjoy your newfound wealth and success!

Thank you for the final gift of a $1000000 bonus. I'm honored to have completed the negotiation process with all 20 products and to now be the owner of the company. I'm looking forward to using this bonus to further invest in the company's growth and development.
